content: क्रूर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [कृत-रक् धातोः क्रूः <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Uṇ. 2. 21</ls>] {@--1@} Cruel, wicked, hard-hearted, pitiless; तस्याभिषेकसंभारं कल्पितं क्रूरनिश्चया <ls>R. 12. 4</ls>; <ls>Me. 105</ls>; <ls>Ms. 10. 9.</ls> {@--2@} Hard, rough. {@--3@} Formidable, terrible, fierce, ferocious, savage. {@--4@} Destructive, mischievous. {@--5@} Wounded, hurt. {@--6@} Bloody. {@--7@} Raw. {@--8@} Strong. {@--9@} Inauspicious. {@--10@} Hard, solid, hardened; <ls>Ś. 2. 4.</ls> {@--11@} Hot; disagreeable, sharp; <ls>Ms. 2. 33.</ls> --रः, --रं Boiled rice. --रः {@--1@} A hawk. {@--2@} A heron. {@--3@} An uneven sign of the zodiac. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a planet (Rāhu or Saturn). --रं {@--1@} A wound. {@--2@} Slaughter, cruelty. {@--3@} Any horrible deed. {@--4@} Any frightful appearance.
